description: Attempting to read OkHttp ResponseBody multiple times. ResponseBody can only be consumed once.
commonCauses: Body consumed in interceptor then in app
Logging body then trying to parse
Not buffering body for multiple reads
solutions: Read body only once and store result
Clone response if needed multiple times
Cache body content after first read
prevention: Buffer body if multiple reads needed
examples: // Bad: val body = response.body?.string(); val body2 = response.body?.string() // ERROR
val peek = response.peekBody(1024); Log.d(TAG, peek.string()); val actual = response.body?.string()
val logging = HttpLoggingInterceptor().apply { level = BODY }; client.addInterceptor(logging)
